title: Legal Updates and Training for Fire Departments
summary: The newsletter discusses proposed changes to the Public Records Act in Washington state, allowing charging of search fees or labor expended under certain conditions. It highlights a case involving delayed acknowledgment of public records requests and penalties, emphasizing the importance of timely responses. Training sessions on regional fire authorities are also featured.
